TheRuler.Model
Class Grammar

java.lang.Object
  TheRuler.Model.Grammar

public class Grammar
extends Object

Represents SRGS grammar with XML content and meta information.

Author:
Peter Gren

Grammar

Method Detail

getMeta

public GrammarMeta getMeta()
Gets grammar meta information wraped in grammar meta object. Grammar meta does not contain XML content.

Returns:
Grammar meta information in GrammarMeta

setMeta

public void setMeta(GrammarMeta meta)
Sets grammar meta information from grammar meta object.

Parameters:
meta - Grammar meta infromation in GrammarMeta object.
